miwin.name: Miwin Dice
miwin.info:
iwin's dice are a set of nontransitive dice invented in 1975 by the physicist Michael Winkelmann. They consist of three different dice with faces bearing numbers from one to nine; opposite faces sum to nine, ten or eleven. The numbers on each die give the sum of 30 and have an arithmetic mean of five

Details on Wikipedia.

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.A-C: Die A beats Die C about 44.4% of the time
tooltips.B-A: Die B beats Die A about 44.4% of the time
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.C-A: Die C beats Die A about 47.2% of the time
tooltips.C-B: Die C beats Die B about 44.4% of the time
